\int\rho(dp\,dq)\Phi({p^{2}\over 2m}).(\xi\cdot p-\alpha p^{2})=0

math.alttext: {d\over dt}({p^{2}\over 2m}+V)={p\over m}\cdot\dot{p}+\partial_{q}\cdot\dot{q}% ={p\over m}\cdot(-\partial_{q}V+\xi-\alpha p)+\partial_{q}\cdot{p\over m}={p% \over m}\cdot(\xi-\alpha p)
